456000. EVENTNAME456000

Montferrat — Not random

Will happen within 30 days of August 12, 1435
Checked again every 30 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after December 31, 1440)

Description

EVENTHIST456000

Actions

A. OK

  • Stability +1
  • +1 base tax value in the capital province
  • Centralization +1

Montferrat — Not random

Will happen within 180 days of November 24, 1464
Checked again every 180 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after December 31, 1470)

Description

EVENTHIST456001

Actions

A. ACTIONNAME456001A

  • Stability +1
  • +10 victory points

456002. EVENTNAME456002

Montferrat — Not random

Conditions

  • Mantua exists
  • Event 220019 - Montferrato Conspiracy for Mantua has already occurred

Will happen within 30 days of August 12, 1533
Checked again every 30 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after December 31, 1534)
unless prevented by
Action B of 220022 - Maria of Montferrat's Death for Mantua

Description

EVENTHIST456002

Actions

A. ACTIONNAME456002A

Conditions

  • Mantua exists

Effects

  • Stability +1
  • Event 220023 - Inheritance of Montferrat for Mantua is triggered immediately

B. ACTIONNAME456002B

Conditions

  • Savoy exists

Effects

  • Stability -3
  • Event 17311 - Mantuan Inheritance of Montferrat for Savoy is triggered immediately
  • Event 220037 - EVENTNAME220037 for Mantua is triggered immediately

C. ACTIONNAME456002C

  • Stability -5
  • Break vassalization with Mantua
  • -200 relations with Mantua
  • Global revolt risk +4 for 60 months
  • Event 220038 - EVENTNAME220037 for Mantua is triggered immediately
  • Event 17313 - EVENTNAME17313 for Savoy is triggered immediately
